enum: connecting and installing new devices, eg a printer or a modem
copied or moved a file and folder
creating electronic presentations with presentation software (e.g. slides), including e.g. images, sound, video or charts
transferred files between computer and other devices
used spreadsheet`s advanced functions to organize and analyze data, such as sorting, filtering, using formulas, creating charts
using copy or cut and paste tools to duplicate or move information on screen
written code in a programming language

title: Anteil der Jugendlichen und Erwachsenen mit Kompetenzen in Informations- und Kommunikationstechnologie (IKT), nach Art der Kompetenz
